name: Stronger Together (SolarisFalls)
description:
It is recommended to play the unbuilt version (top attachment) within Unity, version 2019.3.6f1, as there are physics issues in the built version for unknown reasons.

Here you’ll find yourself in limbo! To be accepted into the afterlife you need to right your wrong doings along the way. Get too greedy, and karma will play a part in your destiny.

W, A, S, D to move
ENTER to skip through dialogue
E to interact

Artwork by Sasha Gallie
Programming by Charlie Gallie
